member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods for subscribing to IObservables using Dispatchers.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher)
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers using the dispatcher.
member.param: Dispatcher whose associated message loop is used to to notify observers on.
member.returns: Source sequence whose observations happen on the message loop associated with the specified dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.SubscribeOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher)
member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers using the dispatcher.
member.param: Dispatcher whose associated message loop is used to to perform subscription and unsubscription actions on.
member.returns: Source sequence whose subscriptions and unsubscriptions happen on the message loop associated with the specified dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler)
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers on the specified dispatcher scheduler.
member.param: Dispatcher scheduler to notify observers on.
member.returns: Source sequence whose observations happen on the specified dispatcher scheduler.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOnDispatcher``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers using the dispatcher associated with the current thread.
member.returns: Source sequence whose observations happen on the current thread's dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.SubscribeOnDispatcher``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers on the dispatcher associated with the current thread.
member.returns: Source sequence whose subscriptions and unsubscriptions happen on the current thread's dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.SubscribeOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler)
member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers on the specified dispatcher scheduler.
member.param: Dispatcher scheduler to perform subscription and unsubscription actions on.
member.returns: Source sequence whose subscriptions and unsubscriptions happen on the specified dispatcher scheduler.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler
member.summary: Represents an object that schedules units of work on a Dispatcher.
member.seealso: This scheduler type is typically used indirectly through the ObserveOnDispatcher method that uses the current Dispatcher.
This scheduler type is typically used indirectly through the SubscribeOnDispatcher method that uses the current Dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.#ctor(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher)
member.summary: Constructs an DispatcherScheduler that schedules units of work on dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.Schedule``1(``0,System.Func{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,``0,System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Schedules an action to be executed on the dispatcher.
member.param: State passed to the action to be executed.
member.returns: Disposable object used to cancel the scheduled action (best effort).

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.Schedule``1(``0,System.TimeSpan,System.Func{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,``0,System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Schedules an action to be executed after dueTime on the dispatcher, using a DispatcherTimer object.
member.param: State passed to the action to be executed.
Relative time after which to execute the action.
member.returns: Disposable object used to cancel the scheduled action (best effort).

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.Schedule``1(``0,System.DateTimeOffset,System.Func{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,``0,System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Schedules an action to be executed at dueTime on the dispatcher, using a DispatcherTimer object.
member.param: State passed to the action to be executed.
Absolute time at which to execute the action.
member.returns: Disposable object used to cancel the scheduled action (best effort).

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.Instance
member.summary: Gets the scheduler that schedules work on the current Dispatcher.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.Now
member.summary: Gets the scheduler's notion of current time.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Concurrency.DispatcherScheduler.Dispatcher
member.summary: Gets the dispatcher associated with the DispatcherScheduler.
